Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[1]: The mysterious man looks like a war veteran almost. His
right arm seems to be missing and there is something very
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[4]: "Not like we are going to run into each other ever again."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[9]: "You could call me... a veteran of these dungeons."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[10: "Some time ago I found a manuscript concerning the ancient
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[11: "There were multiple pages that were maps of sorts..."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[12: "I was able to locate few of the map locations and there
were buried treasures hidden where the marker was set."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[13: "A couple of the maps are complete mystery to me however..."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[14: "Maybe they're hidden somewhere so deep where I simply
couldn't get yet, or maybe there's something I'm missing."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[15: "In any case, I'm done with this place. I've played with my
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[16: "I can sell you the maps, for say... \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0]."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[17: "How do I know the maps are legit?"
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[19: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[23: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[24: "I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
Map171.Event[41].Page[0].list.message[26: "Ha! I've witnessed horror you couldn't even begin to
Map171.Event[41].Page[1].list.message[0]: "I can sell you the maps, for \c[2]50 silver coins\c[0].
Map171.Event[41].Page[1].list.message[1]: "How do I know the maps are legit?"
Map171.Event[41].Page[1].list.message[3]: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."
Map171.Event[41].Page[1].list.message[7]: "Are you kidding me? I don't think so."
Map171.Event[41].Page[1].list.message[8]: "I got no ways to prove my words. So yeah..."
Map171.Event[41].Page[2].list.message[0]: "You clearly don't take me seriously. So I'm done with you."
Map171.Event[41].Page[3].list.message[0]: "Who knows... Maybe you can even find them."

Map171.Event[257].Page[0].list.message[0: Awful smell comes from all the rotten meat on
the table! Plates are covered with maggots.
Map171.Event[257].Page[0].list.message[1: It does make you wonder if someone actually eats this
stuff. After all, why have them here otherwise?
Map171.Event[257].Page[0].list.message[3: You take some \c[2]Rotten meat\c[0] with you.
